title: Venezuela on a Knife Edge as Trump Authorizes CIA Operations
description: The U.S. has escalated its pressure on Venezuela with reported CIA authorization, military positioning, and the rejection of a proposed transition while a major refinery fire threatens Venezuela’s export capacity.
content:

description: Attorney General of Venezuela Tarek William Saab threatened to declare María Corina Machado a "fugitive" if she travels to Norway.
content:

title: allowing ‘new options’ to go after narco gang led by Maduro
description: WASHINGTON has formally declared Venezuela's Cartel de los Soles a foreign terrorist organisation.
content:
WASHINGTON has formally declared Venezuela’s Cartel de los Soles a foreign terrorist organisation.
The move strikes at the core of tyrant Nicolás Maduro’s power structure and labels his inner circle as “narco-terrorists”.

title: Drug boats from Venezuela are mainly moving cocaine to Europe - not fentanyl to the U.S., experts say
description: The U.S. military has been striking suspected drug boats in the Caribbean, but the cargo is likely cocaine headed to Europe, experts say.
content:

title: Nicolás Maduro dice que Venezuela está lista para exportar por primera vez gas a Colombia
description: Venezuela elevó su producción de gas tras años de crisis, que el gobierno atribuye al embargo de Estados Unidos, mientras expertos responsabilizan la desinversión y la corrupción.
content:

title: Desnutrición infantil en Venezuela se agrava y llega a niveles de la crisis de 2016: tres de cada 10 niños en estado agudo, revela informe

title: Un capitán venezolano en el exilio llamó a que los militares abandonen los cuarteles y capturen a Nicolás Maduro
